raw_comment:
1. I notice that the majority of young people send texts to their parents as their way of reaching out while only a small amount visit in person.
2. I wonder if the reason for this is because of distance/timing or because of laziness/other excuses.
3. This affects my community because we are soon to be heading off to college and needed knew ways to catch up with our parents.
4. " is technology slowly finding a wedge between our relationships?"
ace_sentences: I notice that most young people send text messages to their parents.
I notice that only a small number of young people visit their parents in person.
I wonder whether distance is a reason for this behavior.
I wonder whether timing is a reason for this behavior.
I wonder whether laziness is a reason for this behavior.
I wonder whether other excuses are reasons for this behavior.
Many people in my community will soon go to college.
People in my community need new ways to catch up with their parents.
I ask whether technology is slowly creating a wedge between relationships.
